server module

server.is_json(myjson)

Checks if a particular object is a valid json string

Parameters

myjson (string,byte) – parameter to check

class server.server(host, port)

Bases: object

This is a server class , it represents the server side of our code, it has a constructor server(host,port).It has six parameters and three member functions

Parameters

  • serversocket (socket) – accepts connection from client

  • supersocket (socket) – connects to the super-server(load-balancing server)

  • server_id (int) – server’s id

  • clients (dictionary) – is the dictionary representing connection of each client connected to this server

  • threads (dictionary) – for receiving and sending messages to clients

  • supersocketThread (string) – for receiving messages from the superserver and sending them to the clients

__init__(host, port)

Constructor method, initializes everything

Parameters

  • host (string) – address of the host

  • port (int) – port on which the server is running

accept()

To accept connection from the clients and receive their usernames and use it to store connection with the client in clients dictionary

handle_recv(connection)

receives messages from clients and either sends them back to the receiver client if it is present in the server or sends it to superserver, if it is not present in the server

Parameters

connection (socket) – connection object with the client

recv_supersocket()

To receive messages from the supersocket and send them to the clients to which they are directed
